content:
You're absolutely right! I was in the eastern Sierra Nevada range, near the California-Nevada border. You're really good at this!

I'm excited to hear your recommendations for scenic drives and hiking trails in the area. The Mammoth Lakes area, Mono Lake, and the June Lake Loop all sound amazing. I'd love to hear more about each of these options and get some insider tips from you.

Also, are there any other attractions or activities you'd recommend in the area? I'm open to trying new things and experiencing the best of what the eastern Sierra Nevada range has to offer.

Thanks again for your help, and I look forward to hearing your recommendations!
